replies.body:
Different parts of the boards have different summoner level requirements (you have to level up in game, then post on the boards to update it) to reduce trolls and spamming. What is your issue, aside from being unable to post on a particular board? If you're having technical issues you can ask here, but if you just want to make suggestions or questions more appropriate for a board you aren't high enough level to post on, you'll want to play a bit more so you can.

If your level is not updating appropriate, let us know. It can take some time to update, though usually is pretty quick.

So sad... You are not authorized. on everything and no its not syncing properly. im hit level 5 yesterday and i still couldnt post. about to hit level 7 today and i bet i still wont be able to post. riot has many issues.

Many sections of the boards require level 7 in order to post, while some others set their level requirements a bit higher. I recommend hitting level 7, which shouldn't take you long since you're already at 6, then see if you're able to post. 

If you still encounter issues, please let me know what specific section of the boards you're trying to post on.
praise allah! a response. thank you good sir, i am level 9 at the moment and still i cannat post. help would be grate.
Can you let me know which section of the boards you're trying to post on when you see this issue?
it is sinking now sir. thank allah for sending me a resolution!
oh i am lvl 30 in game and now only i updated here at board
